title: Calories in a Tootsie Pop
meta_description: Learn calories in Tootsie Pop, including carbs, sugars, full nutrition facts per pop, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Tootsie Pop (lollipop with chocolate Tootsie Roll center), assorted flavors, ~17g per pop.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, and manufacturer; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Tootsie Pop contains about 60 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Remove the Tootsie Roll center (lollipop only)
Add 1 tsp nuts on the side

faqs.q: How many calories in one Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Approximately 60 calories per standard Tootsie Pop.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: About 15 g carbs, nearly all from 14 g sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Pop have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; 0 g each.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Minimal variation across flavors; all around 60 kcal.
Yes, only about 10 mg sodium per pop.
